begin: ^Hey bud, do you know anything bout Carlos Ozul?
^Ah dang, he's the one who tried to rob that bank right.
^Yeah, and I head, he was released yesterday. Better avoid him if we ever see him.
^Why don't we bully him eh? Mock him, throw some stones at him-
^Enough of that. If that's what you want, both of us will be the one who end up in prison, not Carlos.
^Good point... (Whispering loudly) Hey that's him passing by!
^(Whispering loudly) Aw.. This ain't good man, we better move...
^(Inside head) First day out of prison and here we go, so many people talking about me... Even men around here are plotting to abuse me.
^(Inside head) What I've done... is it that unforgivable?...
